title: Lipstick Is Our Armour | Valdé Beauty’s Margarita Arriagata
description: Today we have Margarita Arriagiata. She's the founder of Valdé Beauty. And this is a divine lipstick brand launched in 2020. Her mother was the inspiration behind the creation of this brand.
content:encoded: Today we have Margarita Arriagiata. She's the founder of Valdé Beauty. And this is a divine lipstick brand launched in 2020. Her mother was the inspiration behind the creation of this brand.
